query:
INSERT INTO assessments (aiSystemId, frameworkId, assessorId, status, overallScore, findings, recommendations, completedAt) VALUES 
-- ChatAssist Pro assessments
(1, 1, 1, 'completed', 85.50, 'The chatbot demonstrates strong transparency measures and user notification. Minor gaps in data handling documentation.', 'Enhance data retention policies and add more detailed user consent mechanisms.', '2024-06-15'),
(1, 2, 1, 'completed', 78.00, 'Good governance structure in place. Risk management processes need strengthening.', 'Implement continuous monitoring and establish clearer accountability chains.', '2024-06-20'),
-- RecommendAI assessments
(2, 1, 1, 'completed', 92.00, 'Excellent compliance with EU AI Act requirements. Minimal risk system with proper documentation.', 'Continue current practices. Consider voluntary transparency reports.', '2024-05-10'),
(2, 3, 1, 'completed', 88.50, 'Strong content safety measures. Model security protocols are robust.', 'Add additional safety assessment documentation for Chinese market compliance.', '2024-05-15'),
-- ContentGuard assessments
(3, 1, 1, 'in_progress', 65.00, 'High-risk system requires additional human oversight measures. Bias testing incomplete.', 'Implement comprehensive bias testing. Add human-in-the-loop for critical decisions.', NULL),
(3, 2, 1, 'completed', 72.50, 'Partial compliance with NIST RMF. Governance and accountability need improvement.', 'Establish dedicated AI ethics committee. Enhance incident response procedures.', '2024-07-01'),
-- DocGen AI assessments
(4, 1, 1, 'completed', 81.00, 'Good transparency and documentation. Output watermarking implemented.', 'Enhance user training materials and add more detailed usage guidelines.', '2024-06-25'),
-- RiskAnalyzer assessments
(5, 1, 1, 'completed', 70.00, 'High-risk financial system. Strong security but needs more explainability.', 'Implement XAI features. Add detailed audit trails for all decisions.', '2024-07-05'),
(5, 2, 1, 'completed', 75.50, 'Good risk management framework. Map and measure functions well implemented.', 'Strengthen manage and govern functions. Add more stakeholder engagement.', '2024-07-10'),
(5, 3, 1, 'pending', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
